scripts.prepare: echo Starting preparing... && npm run prepare-3.8.0 & npm run prepare-3.9.1 & npm run prepare-4.0.0-alpha.2 && echo Prepare completed.
scripts.prepare-3.8.0: echo Installing typings in 3.8.0... && cd 3.8.0 && typings install
scripts.prepare-3.9.1: echo Installing typings in 3.9.1... && cd 3.9.1 && typings install
scripts.prepare-4.0.0-alpha.2: echo Installing typings in 4.0.0-alpha.2... && cd 4.0.0-alpha.2 && typings install
scripts.build-ts: echo Starting building... &&  npm run build-ts-3.8.0 & npm run build-ts-3.9.1 & npm run build-ts-4.0.0-alpha.2  && echo Build typescript completed.
scripts.bundle: echo Starting bundling... && npm run bundle-3.8.0 & npm run bundle-3.9.1 & npm run bundle-4.0.0-alpha.2
scripts.bundle-3.8.0: echo Bundling typings in 3.8.0... && cd 3.8.0 && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.bundle-3.9.1: echo Bundling typings in 3.9.1... && cd 3.9.1 && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.bundle-4.0.0-alpha.2: echo Bundling typings in 4.0.0-alpha.2... && cd 4.0.0-alpha.2 && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.test: echo Starting tests... && npm run test-3.8.0 & npm run test-3.9.1 & npm run test-4.0.0-alpha.2
scripts.test-3.8.0: echo Runing test in 3.8.0... && tsc -p 3.8.0/test && echo Test in 3.8.0 successfully completed.
scripts.test-3.9.1: echo Runing test in 3.9.1... && tsc -p 3.9.1/test && echo Test in 3.9.1 successfully completed.
scripts.test-4.0.0-alpha.2: echo Runing test in 4.0.0-alpha.2... && tsc -p 4.0.0-alpha.2/test && echo Test in 4.0.0-alpha.2 successfully completed.
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run bundle
scripts.build+test: npm run prepare && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.cleanup-typings: echo Removing typings folders... && for /d /r . %d in (typings) do @if exist %d rd /s/q %d
scripts.cleanup-out: echo Removing out folders... && for /d /r . %d in (out) do @if exist %d rd /s/q %d
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup-typings && npm run cleanup-out
